name: Dimencia
description:
2D Pixelated Survival Game (STILL IN DEVELOPMENT) 

===========================================

15.1.2022 - Dimencia Alpha 1.0 (RELEASED)

- Added World Generation Max 200 Blocks

- Added Tree Generation (Random)

- Added Ore Generation (Random)

- Added Breaking Blocks

===========================================

16.1.2022 - Dimencia Alpha 1.05 (RELEASED)

- Fixed World Generation being almost the same everytime

- Added Water

- Added Lake Generation (At certain level)

- Added Sand (It can generate at certain level or below water)

===========================================
